title: Simcity classic (1)
description:
get DOSBox here's a link:

get Utorrent or another app to get torrents here's a link: 
  
http://www.utorrent.com/intl/en/downloads/win

follow .txt files or read * below if you can't open them...

unzip this file with 7zip or another unzipping app here's a link: 
  
http://www.7-zip.org/download.html


*first time.txt 

move the things in the files folder to a folder for the game remember its address.


*must do every time!!!.txt

open DOSBox then type into DOSBox:

 mount (drive) (drive):(rest of address including folder put a between every  folder)
(drive):SIMCITY

eg:

mount c c:dosprogs
c:SIMCITY

HOPE YOU ENJOY THIS OLD CLASSIC SIMCITY GAME!!!


seed for the whole world!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
